experiment_name: A cell-penetrating artificial metalloenzyme regulates a gene switch in a designer mammalian cell
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:37 °C;    reaction_ph:7.5;    reaction_other_conditions:16 h reaction time, 2.0 µM ArM (22⊂Sav variants) enzyme loading, total 400 µL reaction volume, performed in an HPLC vial;    reaction_substrate_concentration:100 µM
